mapper.select: select id, name,config, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, del_flag from t_battery_param_setting_template where id = #{id}
select id, name, config,create_time, update_time, tenant_id, del_flag from t_battery_param_setting_template limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_battery_param_setting_template(name, config, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, del_flag) values (#{name}, #{config}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update t_battery_param_setting_template
name = #{name},
config = #{config},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_battery_param_setting_template
del_flag = 0
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
